request.description:

  https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/auth \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -d '{
    "username" : "admin",
    "password" : "password123"
}'

item.description:
TEST CASES

StartFragment

``` c
1-POST /creat auth
TC-AUTH-01:Login 
  - Data: {"username":"admin","password":"password123"}
  - Expected: 200 OK + token
TC-AUTH-02:** Login with onther user
  - Data: {"username":"user","password":"pass123"}
  - Expected: 200 OK + token
2-POST /booking (login)
TC-BOOKING-01:Create booking for all data
  - URL: GET /booking
  - Expected: 200 OK + array of bookings
TC-BOOKING-02:Create booking for the least data
  - URL: GET /booking?firstname=John
  - Expected: 200 OK + filtered results
3-GET/booking 
 TC-GET-01:Get all bookings
  - URL: GET /booking
  - Expected: 200 OK + array of bookings
 Get bookings with filter:
  TC-GETID-01: Get booking by valid ID
  - URL: GET /booking/1
  - Expected: 200 OK + booking details
  TC-GETID-02: Get booking by Name (first and last names)
  - URL: GET /booking/2
  - Expected: 200 OK + booking details
4-PUT /booking/{id} 
 TC-PUT-01: Update booking wth avilavile  token 
  - Headers: {"Cookie": "token=abc123"}
  - Data: { "Firstname":"James", "bookingdates" : {
        "checkin" : "2018-02-01",
        "checkout" : "2018-04-01"
    },}
  - Expected: 200 OK + updated booking
  TC-PUT-02: Update booking with id 
  - Data: {}
  - Expected: 200 OK + updated booking
   TC-PUT-03: Update booking with id 
  - Data: {}
  - Expected: 200 OK + updated booking
 5-DELETE /booking/{id}
  TC-DEL-01:Delete booking with accepted token
  - Headers: {"Cookie": "token=abc123"}
  - Expected: 201 Created or 200 OK
  TC-DEL-02:Delete booking already existing
  - URL: DELETE /booking/1
  - Expected: 201 Created

 ```

EndFragment  
TC-AUTH-01:

**Expected**: 200 OK + token  
**Actual**: pass as expected and get the token and save it in variable

item.description:
1-StartFragment

### **Bad Cases**

``` c
 POST /auth - Bad Cases
 TC-AUTH-01: Login with wrong data
-URL: POST /auth
- Data: {"username": "invalid", "password": "wrong"}
- Expected: 200 with no token and /or error message
TC-AUTH-02: Login Without password
- URL: POST /auth  
- Data: {"username": "admin"}
- Expected:400 or 404 Bad Request
TC-AUTH-03: Loginwith empty data
- URL: POST /auth
- Data: {}
- Expected:400 Bad Request
TC-AUTH-04: Login SQL Injection
- URL:POST /auth
- Data: {"username": "admin' OR '1'='1", "password": "any"}
- Expected: 400 Bad Request
POST /booking
TC-BOOK-01: Create booking without firstname
URL: POST /booking
Data: {All fields without firstname}
Expected: 400 Bad Request
TC-BOOK-02: Create booking  wrong total price
URL: POST /booking
Data: {"totalprice": "one hundred ", ...}
Expected: 400 Bad Request
BOOK-03: Create booking with invalid booking dates
URL: POST /booking
Data: {"bookingdates": {"checkin": "invalid-date", "checkout": "invalid-date"}}
Expected: 400 Bad Request
BOOK-04: Create booking with XSS injection
URL: POST /booking
Data: {"firstname": "<script>alert('xss')</script>", ...}
Expected: 400 Bad Request
GET /booking 
GETALL-01: Get bookings With invalid Parameter
URL: GET /booking?invalidparam=value
Expected: 400 Bad Request 
GETALL-02: Get bookings With Bad Paraneter
URL: GET /booking?firstname=<script>alert(1)</script>
Expected: 400 Bad Request
GETALL-03: Get bookings with diffrent values in the same field
URL: GET /booking?firstname=John&firstname=David
Expected: 400 Bad Request
GETALL-04: Get bookings with longparameter value
URL: GET /booking?firstname=AAAA... (1000 letter)
Expected: 400 Bad Request
GET /booking/{id}
GETID-01: Get booking not exist id
URL: GET /booking/999999
Expected: 404 Not Found
GETID-02: Get booking invalid datatype id
URL: GET /booking/abc
Expected: 400 Bad Request
GETID-03: Get booking with negative id
URL: GET /booking/-1
Expected: 400 Bad Request
GETID-04: Get booking with long_id
URL: GET /booking/9999999999
Expected: 404 Not Found or 400
PUT /booking/{id} 
PUT-01: Update booking Without token
URL: PUT /booking/1
Headers: {Without Cookie}
Expected: 403 Forbidden
PUT-02: Update booking invalid token
URL: PUT /booking/1
Headers: {"Cookie": "token=invalid"}
Expected: 403 Forbidden
PUT-03: Update booking without existing token
URL: PUT /booking/999999
Headers: {"Cookie": "token={{auth_token}}"}
Expected: 404 Not Found
PUT-04: Update booking With Invalid_data (negative price)
URL: PUT /booking/1
Data: {"totalprice": -100}
Expected: 400 Bad Request
DELETE /booking/{id} 
DEL-01: Delete booking Without token
URL: DELETE /booking/1
Headers: {Without Cookie}
Expected: 403 Forbidden
DEL-02: Delete booking with invalid token
URL: DELETE /booking/1
Headers: {"Cookie": "token=expired"}
Expected: 403 Forbidden
DEL-03: Delete booking Not exist token
URL: DELETE /booking/999999
Headers: {"Cookie": "token={{auth_token}}"}
Expected: 404 Not Found
DEL-04: Delete booking  twice
URL: DELETE /booking/1 (send twice)
Expected: 404 Not Found in the second send

 ```

EndFragment

// Only run property assertions if JSON was parsed
